                        Executive M.Tech
                        
                            
                                 Executive M.Tech
                            
                        
                    
                
            
        
    


    
        
            
                
    
        Admissions to the Executive M.Tech. programme is deferred to next term. More details will be announced in the website in August 2023.

 

The International Institute of Information Technology Bangalore, a Deemed University, popularly known as IIITB launches executive Master of Technology (E-MTECH) programme in Computer Science specifically targeted at working professionals. The programme follows the regular curriculum of the flagship M.Tech. (CSE) programme but is delivered exclusively to facilitate working professionals to enroll in the programme while continuing their employment.
    



    
        
            
                
                                            Curricular Structure
                                                                Class Schedule
                                                                Admission Procedure
                                                                Fees
                                                                Direct Corporate Sponsorships
                                                                Entrance Exam
                                                                Important Dates
                                                                For More Information
                                                                                    How to apply
                                    
                                    
                        The graduating requirement for the program will be same as the M.Tech program offered at the Institute. The students completing the program will be awarded degree in M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering. The student who joins this program will be able to complete the graduating requirements in about two and half to three years. 

The following Table provide a summary of the credit distribution in the Executive M.Tech. programme, who will be joining the program in August 2023.


 
  
   
   Table 1: Overview of the curriculum
   
  
  
   
   Semester 1
   (16 weeks)
   Aug-Dec 2023

    
   
   
   8 Credits - 2 Foundation Course

   (16 weeks)

   8 or 12 credits -2 Foundation Courses and 0 or 1 Elective

                        The classes will be at the Institute as per the schedule below.

Friday : 5 PM to 8 PM
Saturday: 9 AM to 12 PM
Saturday: 1 PM to 4 PM

While exclusive set of courses will be offered to students of E-MTECH as per the curriculum of the regular M.Tech. as per the special time table noted above, E-MTECH students are free to register for any course that are offered during the working days, as long as they are able to come to the campus to attend the classes and manage their office work.
                    
                                                    
                        
 Eligibility
 
 The minimum qualification for admission to any of the post-graduate programmes at IIITB is 65% in four-year bachelor's degree in engineering (i.e. B.E., B.Tech., or equivalent). For M.Tech in CSE, Bachelor's degree in any one of the following branches will be considered.

 
  Computer Science & Engineering
  Computer Engineering
  Information Technology
  Information Systems
  Electronics & Communication Engineering
 

 The candidate should have two years of relevant work experience and should submit a NOC from the employer. In case the candidate changes job during the programme, the candidate should submit a NOC from the present employer.
 
 Selection Procedure
 
 Admission to the M.Tech Program will be based on the written test and the prior academic performance of the candidates. Candidates with a valid GATE score of at least 500 in "CS - Computer Science and IT" can be exempted from the written test. The syllabus for the written exam is appended at the end of the document.
 
 Following weights will be considered for short listing the candidates for admission.

 
  
  BE/BTech Marks -40%
  
  
  Entrance Exam-60%
  
 
 

                    
                                                    
                        Total fee for the entire program for the students who will be joining in August 2023 batch is Rs. 11,52,000.
                    
                                                    
                        Organizations who want to Sponsor the fee for their employees for completing E-MTECH by paying the fee directly to IIITB may write to Coordinator of the Executive M.Tech. programme. Organizations would be eligible for discounts depending upon the number of students who are going to be sponsored.

The applicable volume discount information is as follows:


 
  
   
   No of Students
   (per admission cycle)
   
   Discount on Tuition Fee
  
  
   10-14
   5%
  
  
   15-19
   8%
  
  
   20 and above
   10%
  
 


Admission test will be administered for the candidates who are recommended by the respective organization. Number of students admitted from each sponsoring organization will be as per the MoU between IIITB and the Organization. 

Those individuals who are not sponsored by the organization may apply directly for the EMTECH programme too

 
                
                                                    
                        Detailed syllabus for the entrance exam including sample questions will be available by May 1, 2023.
 

Selection to E-MTECH will be through a written examination conducted by IIITB. The written examination will comprise a computer-based objective test covering topics in Computer Science theory and systems.
                
                                                    
                        
 
  
   Applications open
   April 3
  
  
   Last date to apply
   June 30
  
  
   Entrance Exam
   July 8
  
  
   Reporting and Joining
   August 4
  
  
   Classes Begin
   August 5
  
 

                
                                                    
                        Please visit the IIITB Continuing Professsional Education web page for more information and updates.

https://www.iiitb.ac.in/academics/continuing-professional-education/executive-programmes
                
                                                                    
                        Candidates can apply online shortly.

For any urgent technical issues on the applicant portal, please reach out via WhatsApp at the number +91-9770502091.

    1. Any errors you encounter when filling the form.
    2. If you do not get e-mail with login-id and password AFTER payment.
    3. If you have difficulty in uploading your documents.

For all other queries, please send e-mail to admissions-mtech@iiitb.ac.in

Note: The portal works best on IE/Chrome/Firefox accessed through the desktop.

All applicants need to pay a non-refundable application fee of INR 1000/-.
